data.text:

The Ether Machine is the first public company purpose-built to own ETH, manage ETH, and compound ETH yield.

We do it directly.

The network effect is real… and accelerating. As capital,

Ethereum isn’t theoretical. It’s critical infrastructure:

🏦 @BlackRock is issuing funds on Ethereum

🏦 Franklin Templeton @FTDA_US is cutting fund admin costs on Ethereum

ETH is powering the transformation of financial markets.

We’re not tourists.

⚙️ We built and led institutional Ethereum at @Consensys from day1
⚙️ Ran one of the largest staking operations in the world
⚙️ Structured $1B+ in capital across cycles and protocols

Now we’ve built the public vehicle Ethereum deserves.

The long-term, public Ethereum company needs its own structure, not a legacy brand or legacy business. The Ether Machine is a purpose-built entity:
✅ No legacy liabilities
✅ No external managers
✅ No staking caps or withdrawal bottlenecks

We manage ETH like a working balance

So why did we build something new? Because the old options weren’t good enough:
🚫 Legacy shells come with baggage
🚫 ETFs can’t stake
🚫 Passive wrappers dilute yield

We built The Ether Machine from scratch-- an active, onchain, regulated ETH strategy.

Bitcoin is digital gold. Ether is productive digital oil.

ETH generates real yield through staking. It’s burned with usage, making it deflationary.
It’s programmable, composable, and used by everything from BlackRock to Uniswap.

ETH is the reserve asset of Web3.

We are The Ether Machine.
Today we launch the largest public vehicle ever built to own and manage ETH with over $1.5B in committed capital.

This is Ethereum’s institutional chapter.
Not passive. Not synthetic. Not outsourced.
⬇️

Why ether?
Because ETH is the backbone of the digital economy.
It settles $14T+ per year, anchors over $130B in stablecoins, and secures the majority of DeFi activity across the ecosystem.

It’s not just a token, it’s collateral, fuel, and native yield. https://t.co/UsL1uyBgmt

The Ether Machine is purpose-built to give institutional investors direct, secure, and transparent access to Ethereum and to compound ETH-denominated yield via staking, restaking, and onchain participation.
